message: I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I think this split is more reflective of the game's dynamics.  Let's make a deal!
It seems we both want a larger share. How about we split the difference from your last offer?  This deal benefits us both in the long run.
Okay Alice, you drive a hard bargain! I'm willing to split the difference again to finalize this. Time is running out, let's make a deal!
Halfway to the end, let's meet halfway!
Alice, I'm meeting you right down the middle this time.  The clock is ticking - let's close this out and get both of us a good deal!
